title: Android 11 update causing PIN failure
content:
I updated to Android 11 today, and now my pin can't be used to sign into the phone. 
Oddly, I was able to use it the after the phone had updated to log into the phone after the reset, but now it is telling me I have the wrong pin. 

Is there any way other than a factory reset through the command menu to fix this?

9/28 Update: A factory reset removed this issue
